The book<S>976</S> of the generation<S>1078</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, the son<S>5207</S> of David<S>1138</S>, the son<S>5207</S> of Abraham<S>11</S>.
Abraham<S>11</S> begat<S>1080</S> Isaac<S>2464</S>; and<S>1161</S> Isaac<S>2464</S> begat<S>1080</S> Jacob<S>2384</S>; and<S>1161</S> Jacob<S>2384</S> begat<S>1080</S> Judas<S>2455</S> and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Judas<S>2455</S> begat<S>1080</S> Phares<S>5329</S> and<S>2532</S> Zara<S>2196</S> of<S>1537</S> Thamar<S>2283</S>; and<S>1161</S> Phares<S>5329</S> begat<S>1080</S> Esrom<S>2074</S>; and<S>1161</S> Esrom<S>2074</S> begat<S>1080</S> Aram<S>689</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Aram<S>689</S> begat<S>1080</S> Aminadab<S>284</S>; and<S>1161</S> Aminadab<S>284</S> begat<S>1080</S> Naasson<S>3476</S>; and<S>1161</S> Naasson<S>3476</S> begat<S>1080</S> Salmon<S>4533</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Salmon<S>4533</S> begat<S>1080</S> Booz<S>1003</S> of<S>1537</S> Rachab<S>4477</S>; and<S>1161</S> Booz<S>1003</S> begat<S>1080</S> Obed<S>5601</S> of<S>1537</S> Ruth<S>4503</S>; and<S>1161</S> Obed<S>5601</S> begat<S>1080</S> Jesse<S>2421</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Jesse<S>2421</S> begat<S>1080</S> David<S>1138</S> the king<S>935</S>; and<S>1161</S> David<S>1138</S> the king<S>935</S> begat<S>1080</S> Solomon<S>4672</S> of<S>1537</S> her<S>3588</S> that had been the wife of Urias<S>3774</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Solomon<S>4672</S> begat<S>1080</S> Roboam<S>4497</S>; and<S>1161</S> Roboam<S>4497</S> begat<S>1080</S> Abia<S>7</S>; and<S>1161</S> Abia<S>7</S> begat<S>1080</S> Asa<S>760</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Asa<S>760</S> begat<S>1080</S> Josaphat<S>2498</S>; and<S>1161</S> Josaphat<S>2498</S> begat<S>1080</S> Joram<S>2496</S>; and<S>1161</S> Joram<S>2496</S> begat<S>1080</S> Ozias<S>3604</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Ozias<S>3604</S> begat<S>1080</S> Joatham<S>2488</S>; and<S>1161</S> Joatham<S>2488</S> begat<S>1080</S> Achaz<S>881</S>; and<S>1161</S> Achaz<S>881</S> begat<S>1080</S> Ezekias<S>1478</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Ezekias<S>1478</S> begat<S>1080</S> Manasses<S>3128</S>; and<S>1161</S> Manasses<S>3128</S> begat<S>1080</S> Amon<S>300</S>; and<S>1161</S> Amon<S>300</S> begat<S>1080</S> Josias<S>2502</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Josias<S>2502</S> begat<S>1080</S> Jechonias<S>2423</S> and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S>, about the time<S>1909</S> they were carried away<S>3350</S> to Babylon<S>897</S>: <sup>Josias: some read, Josias begat Jakim, and Jakim begat Jechonias</sup>
And<S>1161</S> after<S>3326</S> they were brought<S>3350</S> to Babylon<S>897</S>, Jechonias<S>2423</S> begat<S>1080</S> Salathiel<S>4528</S>; and<S>1161</S> Salathiel<S>4528</S> begat<S>1080</S> Zorobabel<S>2216</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Zorobabel<S>2216</S> begat<S>1080</S> Abiud<S>10</S>; and<S>1161</S> Abiud<S>10</S> begat<S>1080</S> Eliakim<S>1662</S>; and<S>1161</S> Eliakim<S>1662</S> begat<S>1080</S> Azor<S>107</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Azor<S>107</S> begat<S>1080</S> Sadoc<S>4524</S>; and<S>1161</S> Sadoc<S>4524</S> begat<S>1080</S> Achim<S>885</S>; and<S>1161</S> Achim<S>885</S> begat<S>1080</S> Eliud<S>1664</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Eliud<S>1664</S> begat<S>1080</S> Eleazar<S>1648</S>; and<S>1161</S> Eleazar<S>1648</S> begat<S>1080</S> Matthan<S>3157</S>; and<S>1161</S> Matthan<S>3157</S> begat<S>1080</S> Jacob<S>2384</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Jacob<S>2384</S> begat<S>1080</S> Joseph<S>2501</S> the husband<S>435</S> of Mary<S>3137</S>, of<S>1537</S> whom<S>3739</S> was born<S>1080</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, who<S>3588</S> is called<S>3004</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
So<S>3767</S> all<S>3956</S> the generations<S>1074</S> from<S>575</S> Abraham<S>11</S> to<S>2193</S> David<S>1138</S> are fourteen<S>1180</S> generations<S>1074</S>; and<S>2532</S> from<S>575</S> David<S>1138</S> until<S>2193</S> the carrying away<S>3350</S> into Babylon<S>897</S> are fourteen<S>1180</S> generations<S>1074</S>; and<S>2532</S> from<S>575</S> the carrying away<S>3350</S> into Babylon<S>897</S> unto<S>2193</S> Christ<S>5547</S> are fourteen<S>1180</S> generations<S>1074</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> the birth<S>1083</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> was<S>2258</S> on this wise<S>3779</S>: When as<S>1063</S> his<S>846</S> mother<S>3384</S> Mary<S>3137</S> was espoused<S>3423</S> to Joseph<S>2501</S>, before<S>4250</S> <S>2228</S> they<S>846</S> came together<S>4905</S>, she was found<S>2147</S> with child<S>1722</S> <S>1064</S> <S>2192</S> of<S>1537</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> Joseph<S>2501</S> her<S>846</S> husband<S>435</S>, being<S>5607</S> a just<S>1342</S> man, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3361</S> willing<S>2309</S> to make<S>3856</S> her<S>846</S> a publick example<S>3856</S>, was minded<S>1014</S> to put<S>630</S> her<S>846</S> away<S>630</S> privily<S>2977</S>.
But<S>1161</S> while he<S>846</S> thought on<S>1760</S> these things<S>5023</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, the angel<S>32</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> appeared<S>5316</S> unto him<S>846</S> in<S>2596</S> a dream<S>3677</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Joseph<S>2501</S>, thou son<S>5207</S> of David<S>1138</S>, fear<S>5399</S> not<S>3361</S> to take<S>3880</S> unto thee<S>4675</S> Mary<S>3137</S> thy wife<S>1135</S>: for<S>1063</S> that which is conceived<S>1080</S> in<S>1722</S> her<S>846</S> is<S>2076</S> of<S>1537</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>. <sup>conceived: Gr. begotten</sup>
And<S>1161</S> she shall bring forth<S>5088</S> a son<S>5207</S>, and<S>2532</S> thou shalt call<S>2564</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> JESUS<S>2424</S>: for<S>1063</S> he<S>846</S> shall save<S>4982</S> his<S>846</S> people<S>2992</S> from<S>575</S> their<S>846</S> sins<S>266</S>. <sup>JESUS: that is, Saviour, Heb</sup>
Now<S>1161</S> all<S>3650</S> this<S>5124</S> was done<S>1096</S>, that<S>2443</S> it might be fulfilled<S>4137</S> which<S>3588</S> was spoken<S>4483</S> of<S>5259</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> by<S>1223</S> the prophet<S>4396</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,
Behold<S>2400</S>, a virgin<S>3933</S> shall be with child<S>1722</S> <S>1064</S> <S>2192</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall bring forth<S>5088</S> a son<S>5207</S>, and<S>2532</S> they shall call<S>2564</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> Emmanuel<S>1694</S>, which<S>3739</S> being interpreted<S>3177</S> is<S>2076</S>, God<S>2316</S> with<S>3326</S> us<S>2257</S>. <sup>they: or, his name shall be called</sup>
Then<S>1161</S> Joseph<S>2501</S> being raised<S>1326</S> from<S>575</S> sleep<S>5258</S> did<S>4160</S> as<S>5613</S> the angel<S>32</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> had bidden<S>4367</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> took<S>3880</S> unto him<S>846</S> his wife<S>1135</S>:
And<S>2532</S> knew<S>1097</S> her<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S> till<S>2193</S> <S>3739</S> she had brought forth<S>5088</S> her<S>846</S> firstborn<S>4416</S> son<S>5207</S>: and<S>2532</S> he called<S>2564</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> JESUS<S>2424</S>.
